ivardefs.name: authoredOn
ivardefs.desc: When the request transitioned to being actionable.

ivardefs.name: basedOn_
ivardefs.desc: Plan/proposal/order fulfilled by this request.

ivardefs.name: bodySite_
ivardefs.desc: Anatomic location where the procedure should be performed. This is the target site.

ivardefs.name: category_
ivardefs.desc: A code that classifies the service for searching, sorting and display purposes (e.g. "Surgical Procedure").

ivardefs.name: code
ivardefs.desc: A code that identifies a particular service (i.e., procedure, diagnostic investigation, or panel of investigations) that have been requested.

ivardefs.name: doNotPerform
ivardefs.desc: Set this to true if the record is saying that the service/procedure should NOT be performed.

ivardefs.name: encounter
ivardefs.desc: An encounter that provides additional information about the healthcare context in which this request is made.

ivardefs.name: identifier_
ivardefs.desc: Identifiers assigned to this order instance by the orderer and/or the receiver and/or order fulfiller.

ivardefs.name: instantiatesCanonical_
ivardefs.desc: The URL pointing to a FHIR-defined protocol, guideline, orderset or other definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this ServiceRequest.

ivardefs.name: instantiatesUri_
ivardefs.desc: The URL pointing to an externally maintained protocol, guideline, orderset or other definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this ServiceRequest.

ivardefs.name: insurance_
ivardefs.desc: Insurance plans, coverage extensions, pre-authorizations and/or pre-determinations that may be needed for delivering the requested service.

ivardefs.name: intent
ivardefs.desc: Whether the request is a proposal, plan, an original order or a reflex order.

ivardefs.name: locationCode_
ivardefs.desc: The preferred location(s) where the procedure should actually happen in coded or free text form. E.g. at home or nursing day care center.

ivardefs.name: locationReference_
ivardefs.desc: A reference to the the preferred location(s) where the procedure should actually happen. E.g. at home or nursing day care center.

ivardefs.name: note_
ivardefs.desc: Any other notes and comments made about the service request. For example, internal billing notes.

ivardefs.name: orderDetail_
ivardefs.desc: Additional details and instructions about the how the services are to be delivered.   For example, and order for a urinary catheter may have an order detail for an external or indwelling catheter, or an order for a bandage may require additional instructi

ivardefs.name: patientInstruction
ivardefs.desc: Instructions in terms that are understood by the patient or consumer.

ivardefs.name: performerType
ivardefs.desc: Desired type of performer for doing the requested service.

ivardefs.name: performer_
ivardefs.desc: The desired performer for doing the requested service.  For example, the surgeon, dermatopathologist, endoscopist, etc.

ivardefs.name: priority
ivardefs.desc: Indicates how quickly the ServiceRequest should be addressed with respect to other requests.

ivardefs.name: reasonCode_
ivardefs.desc: An explanation or justification for why this service is being requested in coded or textual form.   This is often for billing purposes.  May relate to the resources referred to in `supportingInfo`.

ivardefs.name: reasonReference_
ivardefs.desc: Indicates another resource that provides a justification for why this service is being requested.   May relate to the resources referred to in `supportingInfo`.

ivardefs.name: relevantHistory_
ivardefs.desc: Key events in the history of the request.

ivardefs.name: replaces_
ivardefs.desc: The request takes the place of the referenced completed or terminated request(s).

ivardefs.name: requester
ivardefs.desc: The individual who initiated the request and has responsibility for its activation.

ivardefs.name: requisition
ivardefs.desc: A shared identifier common to all service requests that were authorized more or less simultaneously by a single author, representing the composite or group identifier.

ivardefs.name: specimen_
ivardefs.desc: One or more specimens that the laboratory procedure will use.

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: The status of the order.

ivardefs.name: subject
ivardefs.desc: On whom or what the service is to be performed. This is usually a human patient, but can also be requested on animals, groups of humans or animals, devices such as dialysis machines, or even locations (typically for environmental scans).

ivardefs.name: supportingInfo_
ivardefs.desc: Additional clinical information about the patient or specimen that may influence the services or their interpretations.     This information includes diagnosis, clinical findings and other observations.  In laboratory ordering these are typically referred

properties.desc: A record of a request for service such as diagnostic investigations, treatments, or operations to be performed.
